mapper.insert: insert into om_pick_label (pick_label_id, pick_head_id, print_label_id, recommend, create_time) values (#{pickLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recommend,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into om_pick_label
pick_label_id,
pick_head_id,
print_label_id,
recommend,
create_time,
#{pickLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{recommend,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update om_pick_label
pick_head_id = #{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pick_label_id = #{pickLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select spl.package_id as packageId, m.material_no as materialNo, m.material_name as materialName, m.material_desc as materialDesc, spl.num from om_pick_label opl left join si_print_label spl on opl.print_label_id = spl.print_label_id left join si_material m on spl.material_id = m.material_id where opl.pick_head_id = #{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select pl.package_id as packageId, pl.num from om_pick_label pl left join si_storage_label sl on pl.print_label_id = sl.print_label_id where pl.pick_head_id = #{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sl.material_lock_id is not null
